app_descript:
Face & Body Editor - AI Photo is an all-in-one image editing solution designed to refine selfies and full-body shots. Harness the power of AI to enhance facial features, perfect body contours, or even simulate a height increase, all without resorting to actual plastic surgery or fitness workouts. Go back in time with nostalgic yearbook filters, get creative with the muscle editor, and put your best face forward with advanced beauty and reshaping tools.
